BREAST-COMPOSITION: The breast tissue in this mammogram image appears to be heterogeneously dense.
FINDINGS: There is a round, well-circumscribed opacity with a regular margin and a density slightly greater than the surrounding tissue. This finding is suggestive of a benign fibroadenoma or a benign fat necrosis. However, due to the heterogeneously dense breast tissue, short-term follow-up is recommended to confirm stability.
